items.abstract: The first examples of carboxylic acid substituted pillar[5]arene structures in the form of its inclusion complexes with ethanol and the anesthetic drug tetracaine are reported.
title: Solid-state assembly of carboxylic acid substituted pillar[5]arene and its host–guest complex with tetracaine
